name: Egoist
description:
Control:

WASD - movement
Space - Jump
E - Interact
R - Inspect
Z - Drop Item 
F - Craft (Need Workbench)
P - Teleport(if you stack)
M - Mute Music
Esc - Quit The Game
Left mouse button - Set Target in battle mode

Main Quest - Prepare supplies for the cart (8 canned)
Battle Every 3 days

Attention! The dragon loves your food.

Assets
